name: 401CodeNotes
description: ## Class 1 Notes   * Writing test driven development     * Red: broken     * Green: Pass     * yellow: still in process   * Using Jest     * Package that makes it very simple to test JavaScript code     * Installed globally     * npm init inside of testing       * npm install jest   * Coverage     * the full coverage that is/needs to be tested     * if there is a line of code that isn't tested it will deduct
